GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
misc: sgi-gru: fix use-after-free error in gru_set_context_option, gru_fault and gru_handle_user_call_os

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit dbc1bb8c8ea930f188b7ce45db162807b3f4b66a, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit 55484c45dbeca2eec7642932ec3f60f8a2d4bdbf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: sgi-gru: fix use-after-free error in gru_set_context_option, gru_fault and gru_handle_user_call_os
